description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Eye-Popping 3-D for colored glasses or 3D-TV! Classic block-breaking gameplay explodes in your face as you shoot Balls through 35 levels of brick, alone or with a friend. Wreak DESTRUCTION with your Thumbs while you clear Puzzles, create Combos and earn a 4-Star Score! Supports variable-depth graphics for 3DTV, Anaglyph Glasses (coloured Red-Cyan or Green-Magenta), or 2D-Only, in stunning 1080-P
description.short: Eye-Popping 3-D for colored glasses or 3D-TV! Classic block-breaking gameplay explodes in your face as you shoot Balls through 35 levels of brick, alone or with a friend. Wreak DESTRUCTION with your Thumbs while you clear Puzzles, create Combos and earn a 4-Star Score! Supports variable-depth graphics for 3DTV, Anaglyph Glasses (coloured Red-Cyan or Green-Magenta), or 2D-Only, in stunning 1080-P
